programming.title: Programming
programming.description: I'm involved in programming activities mainly related to AITuber, generative AI, and Model Context Protocol (MCP)
programming.taskmate: AI task management tool: A web application that streamlines task management for AI agents
programming.aituber_app: AItuber applications: AI response generation systems for Virtual YouTubers
programming.gen_ai_tools: Generative AI tools: Image generation assistant tools utilizing generative AI models like Stable Diffusion

streaming.title: Streaming Activities
streaming.description: I'm currently streaming AITuber, generative AI, and AI Coding activities on Twitch
streaming.gift_info: If you follow my channel, I'll gift you one AI-generated image
streaming.webapps_desc: I create web tools to help with AI art generation and management.
streaming.code_samples_desc: Various frontend and Python scripts are available. Feel free to fork and experiment with them.
streaming.schedule_desc: I stream various games including action and RPG titles, mostly on weekday mornings!
streaming.archives_desc: Missed a stream? You can watch past broadcasts on my Twitch channel.

contact.title: Contact & SNS
contact.description: Get in touch or follow me on social media
contact.issues: If you have questions or feedback, please open an issue on GitHub:
contact.guidelines1: Check existing issues before creating a new one
contact.guidelines2: Use a clear and descriptive title
contact.guidelines3: Include as much detail as possible
contact.guidelines4: Add labels to categorize your issue (if applicable)
contact.message: Feel free to reach out with feedback, collaboration ideas, or just to say hello!

footer.rights: Please contact me regarding reuse or redistribution of any content.
